short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An answer check extension for japanesetest4you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever used the japanesetest4you.com website and found it cumbersome to have to to manually check your answers based on the answer key? This is a simple chrome extension that automates that whole process. It adds a Check Answers button next to the answer key, which when clicked, checks your answers for you.
